warning.no_signal: No valid Spout2 source selected in "Avatar Source"
updater.info:
A newest update for VtubeLighting is available !

<size=70%> Updating the application is very important to ensure that you will not encounter any bugs.


To install the newest version you just have to download the new version by clicking on the green button and close the app. After downloading you can safely delete the old folder.
tooltip.app.resolution_content: It is recommended to choose the same resolution as your streaming resolution because you will lose image quality if the resolution is lower than your streaming resolution
tooltip.app.max_fps_content: It is recommended to use the same framerate as your stream. Remember: the highest FPS, the highest CPU usage
tooltip.lighting_setup.avatar_source_con: Activate Spout2 on your Vtubing software and select it in this list
tooltip.lighting_setup.light_source_cont: In OBS Studio create a new scene, everything in this scene will light up your avatar. Now open the Virtual Camera settings, set output type to "Scene" and set output selection to your new scene. Now start the virtual camera and select it in this list.
tooltip.lighting_settings.light_opacity_: Controls how much of your OBS scene should be visible onto your avatar
tooltip.lighting_settings.light_intensit: Controls the intensity of the lighting projected onto your avatar
tooltip.lighting_settings.light_update_r: Controls how many times per second the lighting should be updated. (The higher value the best but can be costly in performance)
